name: Kindlesuite
body:
KindleSuite 4.0
===========

![KS4_screenshot](http://dl.kfsowi.com/tools/kindlesuite/resources/KS4.png)

KS4.0 is currently under development. For a working earlier version see [Download KS3](https://github.com/secretdevwork/KS3/archive/master.zip)

KindleSuite is a tool suite designed to collect all of the tools available for
developing and modifying the Amazon Kindle Fire HD (7") 2013 into one
User Interface to make things as easy as possible for endusers.

KindleSuite includes the following features:

* Backup & Restore Apps
* Factory Restore
* Root
* Install Gapps
* Install ROM's

Find more info on [Google+](https://plus.google.com/communities/115612726860884592519)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
